001package com.github.sarxos.webcam;
002
003/**
004 * Motion listener used to signal motion detection.
005 * 
006 * @author bartosz Firyn (SarXos)
007 */
008public interface WebcamMotionListener {
009
010        /**
011         * Will be called after motion is detected.
012         * 
013         * @param wme motion event
014         */
015        public void motionDetected(WebcamMotionEvent wme);
016
017}
